abilities.description: Causes your next attack to apply a poison for 4 seconds, slowing by 25% and dealing 0.75x your intelligence as damage every second. This attack has True Strike.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
144 mana, 0.6 mana regeneration and 1.2% flat base magic resistance.
8.4 main attack damage to universal heroes.
name: Witch Blade
description: A spiteful blade inadvertently possessed by the soul of its incautious creator.
